name: environment_scenario_get_the_status_of_a_specific_application_deployed
description: Test case for: As a user, I want to get the status of a specific application deployed in a Cyoda environment.

parts.text: get the status of a specific application deployed in a Cyoda environment.

I can fetch that — which environment (e.g., **dev**, **staging**, **prod**) and **application name** should I check? If you don't know the deployment name I can list apps in the environment first.

[options-single-choice: Provide environment & app, List Environments, Cancel]
